name: Limn
summary: A Swift library for inspecting and comparing values in Swift and Objective-C.
description:
Limn is a Swift library for inspecting and comparing values in Swift and Objective-C. It was
                   conceived as a more concise and complete alternative to Swift's dump() and over time it gained other
                   helpful features for debugging such as support for persistence, diffing and filtering of child
                   elements.
